title: Growth By Day
tech: MERN Stack - MongoDB, Express, React, Node
description: This live and running full stack time tracker application helps users keep track of the time spent each day on certain tasks/activities. The user can sort their time logs by activity category or month as well as view all logs at once. Also, the user can view graphs of how many hours they put into an activity each day of a selected month. This application keeps track of user sessions with JSON Web Tokens. The backend supports requests including: registration, login, logout, adding time logs, deleting time logs, and getting time logs. This is still a work in progress with many updates and new features to come! My inspiration for this project came from my habit of tracking how long I spend playing guitar and coding each day (my two biggest passions).

title: Recipe Book
description: I love to cook - I cook just about every meal I eat. The worst parts about cooking for me was trying to remember recipes and searching though old recipes to find exactly what I was looking for. To solve this issue - I created a virtual recipe book. This “book” lets me search by recipe name, ingredient, and oven temperature! By adding the ability to search by oven temperature, I was able to learn what recipes I can cook at the same time - this makes for easy meal prep and more efficient meals!

title: Appointment Alert System
description: This program provides a way for doctors office personnel to store patient information and appointments. Whenever new patients register, they receive a text message. When a patient creates a new appointment, they also receive a text message to verify that their appointment was properly created.

title: This Website
description: This passion project of mine is a result of my continuous efforts to learn new web development skills. It is an ever-evolving project in which changes are constantly being made. It all began as simple HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Later this page evolved to become a templated webpage using Nunjucks. And now, this web page is made up of multiple React components thus enabling greater scalability and optimality for the future! All of these project components were dynamically created from a JSON document, this will make for easy editing down the line!
